WMI_ALLOCATION_AVAILABLE_BYTES.description: Amount of memory immediately available for allocation to a process or for system use

WMI_CONNECTIONS_ESTABLISHED.description: ConnectionEstablished, seen in the code above, is the current number of Established connections, inbound and outbound

WMI_FREE_DISKS_SPACE.description: FreeSpace is the available storage space in bytes on the specified logical disk

WMI_MEMORY_SWAP_RATE.description: A high rate of memory operations involving disk swap are symptoms of memory shortage and affects system performance

WMI_NETWORK_BYTES_RECEIVED_PERSEC.description: BytesReceivedPersec are the current transmission rates for the specified adapter

WMI_NETWORK_BYTES_SENT_PERSEC.description: BytesSentPersec are the current transmission rates for the specified adapter

WMI_PERCENT_DISKS_TIME.description: Percentage of the time the selected physical disks are busy servicing read or write requests

WMI_PERCENT_PROCESSOR_TIME.description: Percentage of the time the processor is busy doing non-idle threads
